import React, { Component } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' //import ShowBook from './ShowBook' //import { Link, Route } from 'react-router-dom' class BookTableRow extends Component { static propTypes = { books: PropTypes.array.isRequired, onChangeShelf: PropTypes.func.isRequired } render() { //const books1 = this.props.books.filter(books => books.shelf === 'currentlyReading'); //const books2 = this.props.books.filter(books => books.shelf === 'read'); // const books3 = this.props.books.filter(books => books.shelf === 'wantToRead'); const { currentlyReading, read, wantToRead } = this.props const onChangeShelf = this.props.onChangeShelf return (

Currently Reading

    {currentlyReading.map((Book) => (
  1. {Book.title}
    {Book.authers}
    2. ))}

Read

    {read.map((Book) => (
  1. {Book.title}
    {Book.authers}
    2. ))}

Want to Read

    {wantToRead.map((Book) => (
  1. {Book.title}
    {Book.authers}
    2. ))}
); } } export default BookTableRow
